mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xsdj_head (KHSH, KHMC, KHDZ, KHDH, KHYH, BZ, DJRQ, DJH, DJZL, DUBZ, KPJH) VALUES (#{khsh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khmc, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khdz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{khdh, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{khyh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djrq, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{djh, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{djzl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dubz, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kpjh, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
